In the next few steps, you'll tell Plex: Sonraki bir kaç adımda, Plex'e müzik, video ve photoğraflarınızın yerlerini söylemelisiniz. Plex sizin için medyalarınızı organize edip, güzel bir kütüphane oluşturacak.
We will then show you how to get iOS, An: We will then show you how to get iOS, Android, Mac, PC, and Connected TV apps so that you can access your library from any devices you own, both inside the home and on the go.
Please check that this file exists and t: Lütfen dosyanın varlığını ya da gerekli sürücünün takılı olduğunu kontrol edin.
Analyzes all the media files in the libr: Kütüphanedeki medyaları analiz et. Analiz Plex'in medyalarınız hakkında bilgi edinip onları en iyi şekilde nasıl oynatması gerektiğini anlamasına yardım edecektir.
Cleans up the library database and ensur: Kütüphane database'ini temizler ve mümkün olan en hızlı şekilde çalışmasını sağlar. Özellikle kütüphane'ye çok sayıda medya eklenip ya da kaldırıldığında kullanışlıdır.
Publishing a server makes it automatical: Server'ı yayınladığınızda modeminizde hiçbir ayar yapmadan, uygun cihazlarınızda otomatik olarak kullanılmasını sağlar.
The media server stores information abou: The media server stores information about your media to disk, as well as posters, artwork, and other media resources from the Internet. Running this task works in the background to delete any bundles which are no longer in use. On Windows and OS X, these files will be moved to the trash.
Plex organizes your library into section: Plex organizes your library into sections, organized by type. You can add as many sections as you want, and you can have multiple sections with the same type.
Removes a library section and all items: Removes a library section and all items inside. It does not delete any media files. View progress and ratings are preserved, in case any of the items are added in the future.
Name: İsim
Forces a download of fresh media informa: Forces a download of fresh media information from the Internet. This can take a long time. Any locked fields are not modified.
Please check the permissions for this fi: Lütfen bu dosya için izinleri kontrol edin.
By default the media server doesn't remo: By default the media server doesn't remove information for media right away. This helps if a drive is temporarily disconnected. When you empty the trash for a section, all information about missing media is deleted. No files on disk are touched.
Unable to listen for events on {1}.
Plex channels give you access to online: Plex channels give you access to online media from a variety of sites. You can browse and install these channels from the Channel Directory, but get started by installing some featured channels.

Select which additional agents should co: Select which additional agents should contribute to metadata from {1}, and drag them to change the order of preference.

A problem has been detected with a core: A problem has been detected with a core component of Plex. Please visit the forums and provide your logs, as described here.
Channels may require plugins to be insta: Channels may require plugins to be installed alongside the media server. Click on the links below to download the installer for each plugin.
Add videos to your queue from the browse: Add videos to your queue from the browser
To save a video to your queue, click “❯: To save a video to your queue, click “❯ Plex It!” in your Bookmarks Bar so you can watch it later.

Or send videos to your queue by email: Or send videos to your queue by email

Let's start by giving your Plex server a: Let's start by giving your Plex server a friendly name so it can identify itself to other computers on the network. If you leave it blank, your computer name will be used.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: Would you like to help us make Plex better for everyone? We collect anonymous data, which we use to improve the service over time.
If you would like to receive announcemen: If you would like to receive announcements about Plex, please enter your email address below. Don't worry, we won't send you spam.
myPlex makes it easy to get to your medi: myPlex makes it easy to get to your media no matter where you are.
With a myPlex account you will be able t:
With a myPlex account you will be able to queue up video from your browser,
access your content from outside your home and easily share content with friends and family.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this very moment, Plex is working tirelessly to build your library, and make it look beautiful. Like, there are at least a dozen mice on spinny wheels inside your computer, all peddling furiously.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Feel free to watch Plex work, or take this opportunity to download some Plex apps!
